title: typefaces used on "absolute vodka" bottle
content:
hey how’s everybody doing

is there annybody here who can say what typefaces are being used on the “absolute vodka” bottles

image

[http://www.pressfiles.net/absolut/taxfree/ABSOLUT\_VODKA\_1liter\_mrk\_hi.jp...](http://web.archive.org/web/20091005013210/http:/www.pressfiles.net/absolut/taxfree/ABSOLUT_VODKA_1liter_mrk_hi.jpg "http://www.pressfiles.net/absolut/taxfree/ABSOLUT\_VODKA\_1liter\_mrk\_hi.jpg")

thnx for helping guys
author: omar

comments.content:
Hi Omar,  
we had both the [sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20091005013210/http:/www.typophile.com/node/3773) (Jan is right, of course) and the [script](http://web.archive.org/web/20091005013210/http:/typophile.com/node/16119) (hand-drawn by Kotte Jönsson) before.  
F
